article_title: Subject To The 3.8% Obamacare Tax? Shift Investment Income To The Kids

article_metadata.author: Tony Nitti

og.description: As the father of two kids under the age of five, I can confidently say that there is no greater lie regarding the recipe for a healthy, happy family than the supposed sanctity of the dinner table. The boy is the biggest problem. He’s nearly five, he’s growing faster than the national [...]
